channel.title: Please help me! haha im so nooby...=[
channel.description:
I just downloaded a source and i cannot figure out how i am supposed to edit the npcs in the home area to shout my username instead of the prewvious owners name. it is really annoying when people argue the fact of whether or not you are the true owner (NOT CREATOR) of the server.. =[
PLEASE HELP

item.title: Please help me! haha im so nooby...=[
item.dc:creator: @deathsheir deathsheir
item.description:
@deathsheir wrote:

i just downloaded windows grep. now what im having trouble doing, is i cannot find the correct npc…i think thats what im doing wrong…im working on “project tony”. i hear it is more difficult than the rest. but i would greatly appreciate a more in-depth explanation. im really sorry if im annoying, i just do not understand what you are saying…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2008, 05:25:15 pm[/size][hr]hahaha wow. i just got it. thank you s0o much for your help magma! <3!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2008, 06:05:42 pm[/size][hr]thanks everyone

Read full topic
